snippet: If the governor does not veto the politically warped and self-serving election maps, New Yorkers will be stuck with gerrymandered districts for another decade.
abstract: Editorial urges New York Gov Andrew Cuomo to keep his campaign promise and veto the politically warped and self-serving election maps being offered by legislative leaders of both parties; warns that if Cuomo does not veto the maps, New Yorkers will be stuck with gerrymandered districts for another decade.
lead_paragraph: If the governor does not veto the politically warped and self-serving election maps, New Yorkers will be stuck with gerrymandered districts for another decade.
